_header: I have twelve oxen that be fair and brown
Note: Considered as an English englyn, cf. Journal of the English Folk Dance and Song Society 4, 130.
_description: A poem about oxen, possibly erotic — four couplets and two-line refrain

OxfBal354.First Lines:
I haue tweff xij oxen þat be fayre and brown&
                    they go a grasynge down by the town…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…With hay with howe with haySawiste not þou myn oxen
                    þou litill prety boyExplicit
